title: Twenty Tones of Red
description: Deeply intense, sensual and romantic Twenty Tones of Red is a novel that takes you on a journey into the heart of a woman’s sexuality.Siobhan is a bright, sassy and beautiful young woman who has always had wild and vivid fantasies and matures to realise that with the right lover she can find true fulfilment. Unfortunately the path of true love doesn’t run smooth and she has to overcome obstacles and wrestle with her fears and insecurities in order to become her true self. The story of how she reaches total sexual fulfilment and romantic bliss will captivate, exhilarate and intoxicate you.The story is perfect for those who loved the bestselling Fifty Shades of Grey but are now ready to embark on a more complete and complex psychological journey.This novel contains fully graphic sexual scenes and language and is not for the easily offended.
author: Pauline Montford
